com.rrs.corona.solutionsacceleratorstudio.solutionadapter
Class SaveAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.ui.part.WorkbenchPart
      org.eclipse.ui.part.ViewPart
          com.rrs.corona.solutionsacceleratorstudio.solutionadapter.SolutionAdapterView
              com.rrs.corona.solutionsacceleratorstudio.solutionadapter.SaveAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension, org.eclipse.ui.IPersistable, org.eclipse.ui.IViewPart, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart2, org.eclipse.ui.part.IWorkbenchPartOrientation
public class SaveAdapter
extends SolutionAdapterView

This class is used to save the information of the soulution adapter in an xml file This information will contaisn the mapping information between the project and dataobject and also the mapping information about the datasource and the dataobject

Author:
Maharajan, Debadatta Mishra
See Also:
ProjectData, DataObjectView, DatabaseViewer

Method Detail

saveAdapterAsXML

public void saveAdapterAsXML(TreeParent root,
                             boolean isDataObject)
This method is used to save all the views information to and xml file. It saves the information as per the SolutionAdapter selected by the user

Parameters:
root - This is of type TreeParent which contains the selected soulutionadapter tree object
isDataObject - This boolean will contain true or false if data object has to be saved or not

generateFiles

private void generateFiles()
Method to generate required files for Solution Adapter

This method is used to copy the required cofig files provided by Apache for running the OJB Application

Parameters:
filePath - of type String refering the path of the file

saveDataObject

private void saveDataObject(com.rrs.corona.sasadapter.DataObjectType dataObjectType)
This method is used to get the information about the dataobject from the dataobject treeview to store in the xml file

Parameters:
dataObjectType - This is of type DataObjectType which will store all the information from the dataobject tree

saveProject

private void saveProject(com.rrs.corona.sasadapter.SolutionsAdapter projectType)
This method is used to get the information abourt the project from the project treeview to store in the xml file

Parameters:
projectType - This of type SolutionsAdapter schema object which will store the information from the project tree
